name: Willard W. GRIER, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Appellee

casebody.data:
<casebody firstpage="3" lastpage="5" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
  <parties id="b55-5">Willard W. GRIER, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Appellee.</parties>
  <docketnumber id="b55-8">No. 11629.</docketnumber>
  <court id="b55-9">District of Columbia Court of Appeals.</court>
  <otherdate id="b55-10">Submitted Oct. 19, 1977.</otherdate>
  <decisiondate id="b55-11">Decided Dec. 15, 1977.</decisiondate>
  <attorneys id="b55-25">Bernard W. Kemp, Washington, D. C., appointed by this court, was on the brief for appellant.</attorneys>
  <attorneys id="b55-26">Earl J. Silbert, U. S. Atty., and John A. Terry, William D. Pease, Stephen R. Spi-vack and' Iraline G. Barnes, Asst. U. S. Attys., Washington, D. C., were on the brief, for appellee.</attorneys>
  <judges id="b55-27">Before NEBEKER, YEAGLEY and MACK, Associate Judges.</judges>
  <opinion type="majority">
    <author id="b56-3"><page-number citation-index="1" label="4">*4</page-number>PER CURIAM:</author>
    </opinion>
